message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However,  $11,500 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $12,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $12,200. That's the highest I can go
